languages.text: {n}Брови "пустотника более простых нравов" сходятся на переносице.{/n} "Нормальные у нас обычаи, господин Монтэг! Я скорее сам в плазме сварюсь, чем позволю, чтобы что-то случилось с Лорд-капитаном!"
{n}The "voidfarer of simpler manners" furrows his brows.{/n} "Our customs are decent ones, Master Monteg! I'd rather boil myself in plasma than let anything happen to the Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: {n}Брови "пустотника более простых нравов" сходятся на переносице.{/n} "Нормальные у нас обычаи, господин Монтэг! Я скорее сам в плазме сварюсь, чем позволю, чтобы что-то случилось с Лорд-капитаном!"

{n}The "voidfarer of simpler manners" furrows his brows.{/n} "Our customs are decent ones, Master Monteg! I'd rather boil myself in plasma than let anything happen to the Lord Captain!"

languages.text: {n}Al oír eso de «gente sencilla», el tipo frunce el entrecejo.{/n} «¡Nuestras costumbres son decentes, maestro Monteg! ¡Yo me dejaría cocer vivo en plasma antes que permitir que le ocurriese nada {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: {n}The "voidfarer of simpler manners" furrows his brows.{/n} "Our customs are decent ones, Master Monteg! I'd rather boil myself in plasma than let anything happen to the Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Al oír eso de «gente sencilla», el tipo frunce el entrecejo.{/n} «¡Nuestras costumbres son decentes, maestro Monteg! ¡Yo me dejaría cocer vivo en plasma antes que permitir que le ocurriese nada {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán!».

languages.text: {n}単純なヴォイドファーラーは眉をひそめた。{/n}「我々の習慣はまともなものです、モンテグ様！ロード・キャプテンの身に何か起こるくらいなら、プラズマで己の身を煮る方がマシだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}The "voidfarer of simpler manners" furrows his brows.{/n} "Our customs are decent ones, Master Monteg! I'd rather boil myself in plasma than let anything happen to the Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}単純なヴォイドファーラーは眉をひそめた。{/n}「我々の習慣はまともなものです、モンテグ様！ロード・キャプテンの身に何か起こるくらいなら、プラズマで己の身を煮る方がマシだ！」

languages.text: {n}眼前这个“相当质朴的人”皱起了眉头。{/n}“我们的习俗那可都是相当正派，蒙特格大师！我宁可自己跳进等离子锅炉里，也不希望舰长大人发生意外！”
languages.original_text: {n}The "voidfarer of simpler manners" furrows his brows.{/n} "Our customs are decent ones, Master Monteg! I'd rather boil myself in plasma than let anything happen to the Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前这个“相当质朴的人”皱起了眉头。{/n}“我们的习俗那可都是相当正派，蒙特格大师！我宁可自己跳进等离子锅炉里，也不希望舰长大人发生意外！”

languages.text: {n}Der "Raumfahrer von einfacherem Gemüt" runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Unsere Sitten sind respektabel, Meister Monteg! Ich würde mich lieber selbst in Plasma kochen, als zuzulassen, dass dem Lord Captain etwas passiert!"
languages.original_text: {n}The "voidfarer of simpler manners" furrows his brows.{/n} "Our customs are decent ones, Master Monteg! I'd rather boil myself in plasma than let anything happen to the Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der "Raumfahrer von einfacherem Gemüt" runzelt die Stirn.{/n} "Unsere Sitten sind respektabel, Meister Monteg! Ich würde mich lieber selbst in Plasma kochen, als zuzulassen, dass dem Lord Captain etwas passiert!"

languages.text: {n}Le « cosmomarin aux manières simples » fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Nos coutumes n'ont rien d'anormal, maître Monteg ! Plutôt me jeter dans une cuve de plasma que de laisser quoi que ce soit arriver {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The "voidfarer of simpler manners" furrows his brows.{/n} "Our customs are decent ones, Master Monteg! I'd rather boil myself in plasma than let anything happen to the Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le « cosmomarin aux manières simples » fronce les sourcils.{/n} « Nos coutumes n'ont rien d'anormal, maître Monteg ! Plutôt me jeter dans une cuve de plasma que de laisser quoi que ce soit arriver {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} ! »

languages.text: {n}'Çok da yol yordam bilmeyen gemici' kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Geleneklerimiz gayet münasiptir Üstat Monteg! Lord Kaptan'ın başına bir şey gelmesine göz yumacağıma plazmada haşlanmayı yeğlerim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The "voidfarer of simpler manners" furrows his brows.{/n} "Our customs are decent ones, Master Monteg! I'd rather boil myself in plasma than let anything happen to the Lord Captain!"
